name: Karioka Sweet Rice Balls
author: mystinkypete
summary: A Filipino family-favorite! These go fast at family gatherings. Can be served on skewers to prevent sticky fingers!
directions: Mix rice flour, shredded coconut, and 3/4 cup coconut milk together in a bowl until dough is well mixed
Form dough into balls, about 1 tablespoon per ball
Heat oil in a pot over medium heat
Fry dough balls in the hot oil until lightly browned, about 5 minutes
Remove pot from heat and transfer balls to a paper towel-lined plate
Pour 1/2 cup coconut milk into a saucepan; bring to a boil
Stir brown sugar into hot coconut milk until liquid thickens, 2 to 3 minutes more
Remove saucepan from heat, cool coconut coating slightly, and dip balls into coating
